is the main language of
. It is also largely mutually intelligible with Uighur, which is spoken in
Uzbek pronunciation is very regular and simple. If you pronounce all of the words as they are spelled, you will be readily understood.

; a : "a" as in "cat"
; ye, e : "ye" as in "yet" (at the beginning of a word), "e" as in "let" 
; i : "i" as in "pin"
; o : "o" as in "pot"
; u : "oo" as in "cool"
; yu : "yu" as in "yoou"
; ya : "ya" as in "yak"
; o' : "u" as in "put", sometimes similar to "au" as in "caught"

Q- hard 'k'.

KH- guttural 'h' like in the Scottish 'loch'
